Making a consensus is a 3 step process:  1) Select the node to produce a block. 2) The node creates and distributes the block. 3) Other nodes accept or reject the block.  PoW needs 10 minutes in step 1. PoS a few seconds. Steps 2 and 3 are similar.   #blockchain #cardano $ada  https://t.co/PaCiU8NDOO
